column2: content:[gradient]Most bodacious! What a most excellent day! We've got the time machine up and running.[!gradient]
content:I wonder what's in [gradient]store for us[!gradient]... today?
content:[wave,10][gradient]This is most excellent[!wave][!gradient]! <color=yellow>Where</color> will we visit today?
content:I think we can go hiking. [shake,2][gradient][sound,dialogue_2]<size=50%>[wave,1]I'm in the mood for sanwiches, too.[!wave]</size>[!gradient][!sound][!shake]
content:I think we can go hiking. [sound,dialogue]<size=50%>[wave,0.5]I'm in the mood for sanwiches, too.[!wave]</size>[!sound]
content:I think we can go hiking. [sound,dialogue_3]<size=50%>[wave,2]I'm in the mood for sanwiches, too.[!wave]</size>[!sound]

column3: note:The square character persists in TextMeshProUGUI.

column2: A dream that brought you so close to me
Because I've heard that song before
Please have them play it again
And I'll remember just when I've heard
You know who's an amazing jazz pianist? Hazel Scott. She's pretty good.
You know who's an amazing drummer? Neil Peart. He's pretty good.
You know who's an amazing lyricist? Chico Buarque. He's pretty good.
[wave,3]You know who's an amazing guitar player?[!wave] Mike Oldfield. He's pretty good.
<size=50%>Your eyes had rolled back into your head and you were chittering about musicians.</size>
Let's [wave]get something to eat[!wave]. I'm starving right now.
<size=50%>Chittering? That sounds like someone else...</size> I could go for some <size=110%>Submarine Sandwiches</size> right now.
<size=50%>Maybe you are okay</size> Let's go eat!
Tell me about your time at <color=yellow>University of American Samoa</color>.
Are you asking about anything in particular?
You're you're you're you're you're you're
